name: Black Madame
mes: [Gira has finally tracked down Black Madame, but has landed into a trap, hands and legs bound. Good news though- he can finally seeing her through the one way mirror into an adjacent room. And who was that she was with... a superhero? She had her arms raised above her, as if they were being held up by magic and couldn't move.]

name: Black Madame

Her plump lips filled disproportionately, resembling overfilled balloons about to burst. Her eyes began to lose their defiant spark.

"Let it consume you," Black Madame whispered between kiss suction sounds, each kiss lewdly emphasizing the contact.

Gira could only watch helplessly, knowing the corruption had begun.
